attributes.action: Restriction of skilled operators’ rights to work on construction sites
attributes.additional_details:
Are you aware that some of the large construction companies are demanding that any workers on their sites must have CPCS training, with no other legal training certificates or cards being accepted??

This is blatant discrimination against fully legal and government backed training companies who deliver courses to improve site safety.

Is it a form of extortion to make already qualified workers who have done the required training to Government HSE accepted standards (ACOP) train and pay again with these self made membership schemes?
